alert.note: Alert for Cayuga; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 2:51PM EDT until June 26 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cayuga County in central New York... Southwestern Oswego County in central New York... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 250 PM EDT, a cluser of severe thunderstorms were located near Fair Haven Beach State Park, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Oswego, Fulton, Fair Haven Beach State Park, Nine Mile Point, Mexico Point State Park, Battle Island State Park, Scriba, Volney, Sterling, and New Haven. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
